page.title: 06A FARMER'S WIFE,BROOK
page.content: The farmer of{DUNSBURY}has a wife with many interests and hobbies.Her main hobby is gardening:and she has a large garden containing many varieties of flowers,vegetables and fruit trees. She has four sons,two of whom are involved in farming,but not in Brook. The farmer's wife enjoys living in Brook and does not feel isolated.She has a car which she uses to visit friends and do her shopping in{ {NEWPORT.} As she is a farmer's wife she has little time,but sometimes she has the chance to relax and maybe watch a little television.
